significant_policies_disclosed: Revenue recognition at point of delivery (IFRS 15)
Inventory valuation at lower of cost and NRV (IAS 2)

critical_judgments.management_assumption: Revenue recognized at point of delivery from factory
critical_judgments.alternative_view: Could recognize at different point in supply chain
critical_judgments.frc_skeptical_assessment: Judgment appears reasonable given business model

key_estimation_uncertainties.reason_of_the_status: Depends on forecasts of future profitability over multiple years
